description: Juicy chicken makes this quick and easy lentil and chickpea dahl extra satisfying.
name: Chicken Dahl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3.2 cups chicken stock, made with 2 stock cubes
1 bunch coriander, fresh, chopped, stalks included

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the chicken for 6 minutes, turning halfway through, until browned. Remove from the pan with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Heat the rest of the oil and cook the onions for 6-7 minutes. Add the garlic, spices and coriander stalks and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in the chickpeas and lentils.
Pour over the coconut milk and stock and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes, stirring and adding more water if necessary.
Add the chicken to the dahl with the lime juice and cook for 2 minutes. Serve with the rest of the coriander on top.
